scripts.publish: run-s clean prepare build:* archive cleanup
scripts.prepare: cpy src/profile.jpg build/ && cpy src/profile.jpg build/assets/
scripts.archive: rimraf build/assets/resume.pdf.html build/assets/profile.jpg && cd build/assets && bestzip ../bastien-arata.zip *
scripts.build:html: hackmyresume build src/resume.json src/htmlpart.json TO build/index.html -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-stackoverflow
scripts.build:assets: hackmyresume build src/resume.json TO build/assets/bastien-arata.txt build/assets/bastien-arata.md build/assets/bastien-arata.yml
